H0.text: 15 October will mark the 600th anniversary of which famous battle. Agnadello

H1.text: 15 October will mark the 600th anniversary of which famous battle. Bannockburn

H2.text: 15 October will mark the 600th anniversary of which famous battle. Castillon

H3.text: 15 October will mark the 600th anniversary of which famous battle. Ajincourt

A4.text: The Battle of Agincourt took place on 25 October 1415.

A5.text: The Battle of Agincourt is one of England's most celebrated victories.

A6.text: The Battle of Agnadello was fought on 14 May 1509.

A7.text: The Battle of Castillon was a battle between the forces of England and France which took place on 17 July 1453 in Gascony near the town of Castillon-sur-Dordogne (later Castillon-la-Bataille).

A8.text: Castillon was the first major European battle won through the extensive use of field artillery.
